context: Is there a Micro SD card port to add content (music files, etc.); and could I download to the console from Google Play, etc?

context: what is special about the day one edition?
response: Nothing really, the box it comes in is black and the controller says Day One Edition in tiny white letters... thats really it.

context: Will this work on the Xbox 360?
response: Im pretty sure! My friends say it works

context: does this slim design still have wireless internet and bluetooth
response: Yes, the version I purchased has both( Slim). I had some little difficulty setting up the wireless network( It isn't that hard, I just didn't know what I was doing). I also established a Bluetooth connection with a Bluetooth keyboard( It was relatively easy.)------ FYI, not backwards compatible with Ps2 games :(

context: Just getting into these games; are there levels of difficulty on this game so a newbee can learn easily???
response: Yes there are. There are five different difficulty levels, many even at the easiest difficulty it is easy for a new player but you still get the good feel of the game and story and you don't feel too powerful, but still easy enough where you won't get stuck. Definitely worth getting.

context: it can work on any mac right
response: Yes it does I played it on my old Mac

context: The installation is not working !!!!!!! It says that you have to have sims 3 installed before? WASTE OF MONEY
response: This is an expansion pack to the original game The Sims 3. Buy the ori first then try installing this one.

context: Does this come with a charging cable as well? I lost mine and was hoping for a two for one.
response: no it does not come with a charger

context: On the Wildstar website, it states that the game comes with 3 7 day guest passes. Does this download give the same guest passes?
response: It applies to the upgraded version of the game I believe

context: Will this game work on the Windows 8 operating system?
response: Yes I use it on windows 8

context: Can I connect a headset that only has one 3.5mm connection and be able to use both the headset and the mic? There is only one line from the headset.
response: No  it wont work, you would need something like this.  PC Computer Headset to 3.5mm Smartphone Adapter - 01-PH35-PC35

context: I love this game but now Im not able to play it and Im not sure why please help I miss my game
response: What is ur OS?

context: It shows that it can charge one motion controller and one navigation controller.  Do 2 motion controllers fit?
response: Yes, two motion controllers and two navigation controllers can be charged all at the same time.

context: How does the base recharge the batteries? Does it plug in? Or does it have to have batteries in it?
response: It plugs into the wall, cord is about 3' long.

context: Can two people play this at the same time with two different guitars?
response: yes two people can play, you will have to have 2 of the adapter cords

context: I have a 4GB xbox 360 slim and am unable to install battlefield 4. Can I use this HDD and install it?
response: Of course. Thats why those exist so you can take up the space and  install games, save settings etc.

context: For those of you that have bigger hands, does this "fit" well? I have bigger hands and its hard to find peripherals that "fit" comfortably.
response: I'm 6'2" / 205lbs, so I have fairly large hands. This device fits me hand just fine. If you have very large hands you may have issues with the lower row outside keys, but I haven't experienced any problems. The palm grip slides out a bit,which helps.

context: how long is the cord
response: A little less than arm's length.

context: Is this software work well with Windows 7?  Based on reviews, it didn't seem like it.
response: It works well with my Windows 7.  My kids love to play it, and haven't had any problems with it so far.

context: My XBOX 360 drive is the DG-16D2S-09C and does not work, if I order the same model, I just have to switch it and my XBOX will work without any problem
response: You'll need to swap out the circuit board on this drive with your old circuit board, uses very little soldering to reattach the wires

context: Just To be clear it can be used with a pc and how would I connect it to my pc?
response: The transmitter has optical in or rca type inputs if your sound card has those or you can use a usb Bluetooth adapter or the mobile device cable for a wired connection direct to the headset from any mp3,mp4 player,smart phone,tablet or your computer headphone jack.  The user manual is available @ http://www.turtlebeach.com/support/entry/830517491/

context: how do you know if it is a fake or real game, thanks.
response: You don't until you actually have it in hand.  You have to start playing it.  If it's fake it will play for a while and then just stop.

context: does an icon for The Rise of Atlantis appear on the desktop?
response: Yes it does. Fun challenging game. Enjoy !

context: How do you get the Premium for Battlefield 4? Can you purchase the code on Live?
response: Yes. You can buy it online. When you log into the game, you just go into the store from the main menu. You can buy singular expansions, or the whole thing.

context: What is the difference between the edition of  "software only"  and "with wii motion plus" ?
response: Wii motion plus is the adapter on the controller in order to play the game.

context: if I buy the PC Download, (I just want to make sure so I get my money's worth), I can download this on steam, im still a bit confused
response: It works with your Steam account.  The only difference is the vendor /cost for the game.

context: Does it have gauntlet?
response: It has Gauntlet 1 and 2!

context: If this is just a game code for steam, does that mean it can be played cross-platform on PC and Mac?
response: You can add the game to Steam using the product codes that come with it (did this myself) and then install it via Steam in the future without need for the physical discs or keys. Not sure if that will allow you to play on Mac, but hopefully Google can help you with that!
